segments.text: Looking into this kitchen, I notice the water gushing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's filling up and spilling over the edge onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman there is just polishing her plate, oblivious to the flood at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear or see that mess happening right in front of her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her shoes is already soaked in the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, turning my attention to the kids, that boy is on a stool that's tilting badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies from the jar up high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister is begging for one with her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is so irresponsible; the stool could collapse and hurt him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water everywhere, cabinets getting ruined, and no one stopping it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks perfect, but inside it's chaos waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe they're sneaking cookies like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to turn off that faucet before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
